abstract.t: Explicit multicast(Xcast)[XCST] is a new kind of Internet multicastand complements the Host Group Model multicast in the sense ofmulticast benefits. Xcast encodes addresses of destinations withinits packet and requires neither any routing information exchangenor state management. Xcast routing utilizes legacy unicast routinginformation managed at every node and is expected to haveperformance good enough for small size multicast groups.
